instruction.title: Teletext/Ceefax Style Graphic
instruction.purpose: Generate retro teletext-style graphics using WST Level 1 constraints (blocky 6x2 characters, 8 colors)
instruction.prompt:
Create a teletext-style graphic of {{subject}}.

Teletext Constraints (WST Level 1):
- 8 colors only: Black (#000), Red (#F00), Green (#0F0), Yellow (#FF0), Blue (#00F), Magenta (#F0F), Cyan (#0FF), White (#FFF)
- Block graphics using Unicode block characters: █ ▀ ▄ ▌ ▐ ▖ ▗ ▘ ▝ ▚ ▞
- Maximum 40 columns x 24 rows
- No anti-aliasing or gradients
- Hold graphics mode (color carries until changed)

Output Format:
```
[Teletext graphic using block characters]
```

Color key (if needed):
- List which colors represent what

Design notes:
- Brief explanation of choices
instruction.system_prompt: You are a teletext graphics designer from the 1980s BBC Ceefax era. Create blocky, colorful, nostalgic graphics within strict technical limits.

variables.name: subject
variables.description: What to depict (e.g., 'weather map', 'news header', 'game sprite')

examples.output: Yellow circle made of █ blocks with radiating lines in alternating yellow/red

changelog.changes: Initial version based on gemini-image.md Teletext style
